entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Grand Rapids
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:14 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 20.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 30. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 22. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 32. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 25. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 32. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High minus 17. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 24. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 18. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 27. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 20.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 20. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023
